data.title: Pdc "World Darts Championship" 2013
data.text:
Starts December 14th, with the draw to be made on Tuesday. I believe.

All but one match will take place in 2012, with the final to be played on January 1st, 2013.

Here’s the draw bracket which I hope will assist any punters. van Gerwen appears to have overtaken Hamilton after the GSOD and now will play in the bottom half, which evens out the draw a little. Could there be a possibility of the draw bracket changing again due to results at this weekend’s tournament? Who knows.
